PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_IeeeAddrReq_t Struct Reference

This request is generated from a Local Device wishing to inquire as to the 64-bit IEEE address of the Remote Device based on their known 16-bit address. The destination addressing on this command shall be unicast. More...

#include <zdo.h>

Data Fields

ShortAddr_t nwkAddrOfInterest
uint8_t reqType
uint8_t startIndex

Detailed Description

This request is generated from a Local Device wishing to inquire as to the 64-bit IEEE address of the Remote Device based on their known 16-bit address. The destination addressing on this command shall be unicast.

Definition at line 372 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

ShortAddr_t ZDO_IeeeAddrReq_t::nwkAddrOfInterest

NWK address that is used for IEEE address mapping.

Definition at line 375 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_IeeeAddrReq_t::reqType

Request type for this command:
SINGLE_RESPONSE_REQUESTTYPE - only the address of the target node is requested
EXTENDED_RESPONSE_REQUESTTYPE - addresses of target's child nodes are also requested

Definition at line 380 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_IeeeAddrReq_t::startIndex

If the Request type for this command is Extended response, the StartIndex provides the starting index for the requested elements of the associated devices list.

Definition at line 386 of file zdo.h.
